contents:
利益相关：左翼

我不确定诸位对“左翼媒体冷处理”这件事的定性是什么。

以下是相关关键词的Google搜索结果，不准确，有信息交叉和误收录，但比较直观。

site:foxnews.com biden sexual assault 29,700
site:cnn.com biden sexual assault 13,200
site:foxnews.com trump sexual assault 29,200
site:cnn.com trump sexual assault 22,600

随便挑的内容，暂时没有细读，见谅：
CNN：
https://www. cnn.com/2020/04/27/politics/biden-tara-reade-senate/index.html
https://www. cnn.com/2020/04/17/politics/joe-biden-allegations/index.html

NYT：
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/12/us/politics/joe-biden-tara-reade-sexual-assault-complaint.html
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/13/business/media/joe-biden-tara-reade-new-york-times.html

WSJ：
https://www.wsj.com/articles/joe-biden-denies-inappropriate-behavior-toward-women-after-allegation-11554051471
https://www.wsj.com/articles/joe-biden-accusers-career-shows-penchant-for-controversy-11554315458

这三个算是左媒的代表。其它的不多说了，我反特朗普但我不反右媒，也不支持拜登。敬请葱油抒发观点时能站在事实的基础上，至少给出“冷处理”的证据，避免主观上的回声筒，多谢。
